Roadmap
=======

This document outlines the planned development roadmap for the Unlook SDK.

Short Term (Q1 2025)
-------------------

**Hand Pose Module Enhancements**

- Add more sophisticated gesture recognition algorithms
- Implement gesture customization and training capabilities
- Add support for multi-hand tracking scenarios
- Optimize performance for real-time applications

**Hardware Support Expansion**

- Complete DLP projector driver integration
- Add support for additional camera models
- Implement automatic camera calibration routines
- Add support for external depth sensors

**Documentation & Examples**

- Create video tutorials for common use cases
- Add more advanced examples and use cases
- Improve troubleshooting guides
- Add performance benchmarking documentation

Medium Term (Q2-Q3 2025)
-----------------------

**Advanced Scanning Features**

- Implement time-of-flight sensor integration
- Add support for laser line scanning
- Develop photogrammetry scanning modes
- Add texture mapping capabilities

**Software Architecture**

- Implement plugin architecture for custom scanning algorithms
- Add support for distributed scanning across multiple devices
- Develop REST API for web-based control
- Add support for cloud processing pipelines

**Performance & Quality**

- Implement GPU-accelerated point cloud processing
- Add neural network-based point cloud enhancement
- Develop automatic quality assessment tools
- Add real-time mesh generation capabilities

Long Term (Q4 2025 and beyond)
-----------------------------

**AI & Machine Learning**

- Develop custom neural networks for 3D reconstruction
- Implement AI-powered scan quality optimization
- Add automatic defect detection capabilities
- Develop predictive maintenance features

**Industry-Specific Solutions**

- Create specialized modules for medical applications
- Develop manufacturing quality control tools
- Add reverse engineering workflow tools
- Implement cultural heritage documentation features

**Platform Expansion**

- Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android
- Create web-based scanning interface
- Add support for embedded systems beyond Raspberry Pi
- Develop cloud-based processing services

Contributing to the Roadmap
--------------------------

We welcome community input on our roadmap. If you have specific feature requests or use cases that would benefit from SDK enhancements, please:

- Open an issue on our GitHub repository
- Join our community discussions
- Submit feature requests with detailed use cases
- Contribute code for features you'd like to see

The roadmap is subject to change based on community feedback, technical feasibility, and resource availability.
